name: FundAnt
short_description: FundAnt is a stock program that focuses on the fundamental analysis (quality of stock) instead of the technical analysis (price movement) of stocks. Using a system of guided weights/ratings, FundAnt seeks to provide accurate and unbiased stock evaluation.
